table, processes it using a PIVOT operation, and calculates percentages of account types relative to their totals. The results are then returned in a structured format, comparing current and previous billing periods.

The procedure involves multiple steps, including data retrieval, transformation using PIVOT, and calculation of percentages. It also involves joining temporary tables and handling potential null values, which adds to its complexity.
This stored procedure does not take any input parameters. It operates based on the data available in the
table and uses internal logic to determine the billing periods of interest.

CREATE PROCEDURE [Billing].[usp_GetEstimatedActualForAccountsExtract]
AS 
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	DECLARE @PublishedBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6), @PreviousBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6);

	SELECT @PublishedBillingPeriod = MAX(BillingPeriod) FROM Billing.EstimatedActualReadingCounts;
	SELECT @PreviousBillingPeriod = dbo.CalculatePreviousBillingPeriod(@PublishedBillingPeriod, 'M');

	DECLARE @tmpEstAct TABLE
		([BillingPeriod] VARCHAR(6) NOT NULL,
		[Reading] VARCHAR(20) NULL,
		[NYPA Accounts] INT NULL,
		[Coned Accounts] INT  NULL,
		[National Grid West Accounts] INT  NULL,
		[Accounts from Other] VARCHAR(MAX)  NULL,
		[ELE Accounts] INT NULL,
		[GAS Accounts] INT NULL,
		[Steam Accounts] INT NULL,
		[Accounts from Other Types] VARCHAR(MAX) NULL);

	-- Report for Estimated Actual Accounts Count
	INSERT INTO @tmpEstAct
		(BillingPeriod,
	    Reading,
	    [NYPA Accounts],
	    [Coned Accounts],
	    [National Grid West Accounts],
	    [Accounts from Other],
	    [ELE Accounts],
	    [GAS Accounts],
	    [Steam Accounts],
	    [Accounts from Other Types])
	SELECT pt_acc.BillingPeriod
		,pt_acc.Reading
		,pt_acc.[NYPA Accounts]
		,pt_acc.[Coned Accounts]
		,pt_acc.[National Grid West Accounts]
		,ISNULL(pt_acc.[Accounts from Other],0) AS [Accounts from Other]
		,pt_acc.[ELE Accounts]
		,pt_acc.[GAS Accounts]
		,pt_acc.[Steam Accounts]
		,ISNULL(pt_acc.[Accounts from Other Types], 0) AS [Accounts from Other Types]
	FROM (SELECT ea.BillingPeriod
			,ea.DataType
			,ea.Reading
			,ea.Header
			,ea.DataCount
			,ea.DateAdded
		FROM Billing.EstimatedActualReadingCounts AS ea 
		WHERE ea.DataType='Accounts' AND ea.BillingPeriod IN (@PublishedBillingPeriod, @PreviousBillingPeriod)) AS t 
		PIVOT(SUM(DataCount) FOR Header IN ([NYPA Accounts]
			,[Coned Accounts]
			,[National Grid West Accounts]
			,[Accounts from Other]
			,[ELE Accounts]
			,[GAS Accounts]
			,[Steam Accounts]
			,[Accounts from Other Types])) AS pt_acc;

	SELECT DISTINCT curr.BillingPeriod
		,curr.Reading
		,curr.[NYPA Accounts]
		,CASE WHEN curr.[NYPA Accounts Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND( 100 * CAST(curr.[NYPA Accounts] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(curr.[NYPA Accounts Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [NYPA Accounts %]
		,prev.[Previous Month NYPA Accounts]
		,CASE WHEN prev.[Previous Month NYPA Accounts Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  ROUND( 100 * CAST(prev.[Previous Month NYPA Accounts] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(prev.[Previous Month NYPA Accounts Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [Previous Month NYPA Accounts %]
		,curr.[Coned Accounts]
		,CASE WHEN curr.[Coned Accounts Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  ROUND( 100 * CAST(curr.[Coned Accounts] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(curr.[Coned Accounts Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [Coned Accounts %]
		,prev.[Previous Month Coned Accounts]
		,CASE WHEN prev.[Previous Month Coned Accounts Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  ROUND( 100 * CAST(prev.[Previous Month Coned Accounts] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(prev.[Previous Month Coned Accounts Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [Previous Month Coned Accounts %]
		,curr.[National Grid West Accounts]
		,CASE WHEN curr.[National Grid West Accounts Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  ROUND( 100 * CAST(curr.[National Grid West Accounts] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(curr.[National Grid West Accounts Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [National Grid West Accounts %]
		,curr.[Accounts from Other] AS [Other Accounts]
		,CASE WHEN curr.[Accounts from Other Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  ROUND( 100 * CAST(curr.[Accounts from Other] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(curr.[Accounts from Other Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [Other Accounts %]
		,curr.[ELE Accounts]
		,CASE WHEN curr.[ELE Accounts Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  ROUND( 100 * CAST(curr.[ELE Accounts] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(curr.[ELE Accounts Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [ELE Accounts %]
		,curr.[GAS Accounts]
		,CASE WHEN curr.[GAS Accounts Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  ROUND( 100 * CAST(curr.[GAS Accounts] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(curr.[GAS Accounts Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [GAS Accounts %]
		,curr.[Steam Accounts]
		,CASE WHEN curr.[Steam Accounts Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  ROUND( 100 * CAST(curr.[Steam Accounts] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(curr.[Steam Accounts Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [Steam Accounts %]
		,curr.[Accounts from Other Types]
		,CASE WHEN curr.[Accounts from Other Types Total] = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  ROUND( 100 * CAST(curr.[Accounts from Other Types] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)) / CAST(curr.[Accounts from Other Types Total] AS DECIMAL(18, 2)), 0) END [Accounts from Other Types %]
	FROM (SELECT tea.BillingPeriod
			,tea.Reading
			,tea.[NYPA Accounts]
			,tea.[Coned Accounts]
			,tea.[National Grid West Accounts]
			,tea.[Accounts from Other]
			,tea.[ELE Accounts]
			,tea.[GAS Accounts]
			,tea.[Steam Accounts]
			,tea.[Accounts from Other Types]
			,teb.[NYPA Accounts] AS [NYPA Accounts Total]
			,teb.[Coned Accounts] AS [Coned Accounts Total]
			,teb.[National Grid West Accounts] AS [National Grid West Accounts Total]
			,teb.[Accounts from Other] AS [Accounts from Other Total]
			,teb.[ELE Accounts] AS [ELE Accounts Total]
			,teb.[GAS Accounts] AS [GAS Accounts Total]
			,teb.[Steam Accounts] AS [Steam Accounts Total]
			,teb.[Accounts from Other Types] [Accounts from Other Types Total]
		FROM @tmpEstAct AS tea
			INNER JOIN @tmpEstAct AS teb ON teb.BillingPeriod = tea.BillingPeriod AND teb.Reading ='Billed'
		WHERE tea.BillingPeriod = @PublishedBillingPeriod) AS curr
		INNER JOIN (SELECT tea.BillingPeriod
				,tea.Reading
				,tea.[NYPA Accounts] AS [Previous Month NYPA Accounts]
				,tea.[Coned Accounts] AS [Previous Month Coned Accounts]
				,teb.[NYPA Accounts] AS [Previous Month NYPA Accounts Total]
				,teb.[Coned Accounts] AS [Previous Month Coned Accounts Total]
			FROM @tmpEstAct AS tea
				INNER JOIN @tmpEstAct AS teb ON teb.BillingPeriod = tea.BillingPeriod AND teb.Reading ='Billed'
			WHERE tea.BillingPeriod = @PreviousBillingPeriod) AS prev ON prev.Reading = curr.Reading;
END;
